verses.verse: Can you draw <S%H4900>out<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> with a <S%H2443>hook<s%>? or his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with a <S%H2256>cord<s%> which you let <S%H8257>down<s%>?
Can you <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H100>hook<s%> into his <S%H639>nose<s%>? or <S%H5344>bore<s%> his <S%H3895>jaw<s%> through with a <S%H2336>thorn<s%>?
Will he make <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8469>supplications<s%> unto <S%H1696>you<s%>? will he speak soft words unto <S%H7390>you<s%>?
Will he <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3947>you<s%>? will you take him for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>?
Will you <S%H7832>play<s%> with him as with a <S%H6833>bird<s%>? or will you <S%H7194>bind<s%> him for your <S%H5291>maidens<s%>?
Shall the <S%H2271>companions<s%> make a <S%H3739>banquet<s%> of <S%H2673>him<s%>? shall they part him among the <S%H3669>merchants<s%>?
Can you <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%> with barbed <S%H7905>irons<s%>? or his <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H6767>spears<s%>?
<S%H7760>Lay<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> upon <S%H2142>him<s%>, remember the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, do no <S%H3254>more<s%>.
<S%H8431>Behold<s%>, the hope of him is in <S%H3576>vain<s%>: shall not one be cast <S%H2904>down<s%> even at the sight of <S%H4758>him<s%>?
None is so <S%H393>fierce<s%> that dare stir him <S%H5782>up<s%>: who then is able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>?
Who has <S%H6923>given<s%> to <S%H7999>me<s%>, that I should repay <S%H8064>him<s%>? whatever is under the whole heaven is mine.
I will not <S%H2790>conceal<s%> his <S%H907>parts<s%>, nor his <S%H1369>power<s%>, nor his <S%H2433>comely<s%> <S%H6187>proportion<s%>.
Who can <S%H1540>discover<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3830>garment<s%>? or who can <S%H935>come<s%> to him with his <S%H3718>double<s%> <S%H7448>bridle<s%>?
Who can <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%>? his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H367>terrible<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
His <S%H4043>scales<s%> are his <S%H1346>pride<s%>, shut up <S%H5462>together<s%> as with a <S%H6862>close<s%> <S%H2368>seal<s%>.
<S%H259>One<s%> is so <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%>, that no <S%H7307>air<s%> can come between <S%H935>them<s%>.
They are <S%H1692>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, they stick <S%H3920>together<s%>, that they cannot be <S%H6504>sundered<s%>.
By his <S%H5846>sneezings<s%> a <S%H216>light<s%> does <S%H1984>shine<s%>, and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%>.
Out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> burning <S%H3940>torches<s%>, and <S%H3590>sparks<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> leap <S%H4422>out<s%>.
Out of his <S%H5156>nostrils<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, as out of a <S%H5301>seething<s%> <S%H1731>pot<s%> or <S%H100>caldron<s%>.
His <S%H5315>breath<s%> <S%H3857>kindles<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%>, and a <S%H3851>flame<s%> goes <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
In his <S%H6677>neck<s%> <S%H3885>remains<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%>, and <S%H1670>sorrow<s%> is turned into <S%H1750>joy<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
The <S%H4651>flakes<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> are joined <S%H1692>together<s%>: they are <S%H3332>firm<s%> in <S%H4131>themselves<s%>; they cannot be moved.
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H3332>firm<s%> as a <S%H68>stone<s%>; <S%H3332>Yes<s%>, as hard as a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of the nether <S%H8482>millstone<s%>.
When he raises <S%H7613>up<s%> <S%H352>himself<s%>, the mighty are <S%H1481>afraid<s%>: by reason of <S%H7667>breakings<s%> they purify <S%H2398>themselves<s%>.
The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of him that <S%H5381>lays<s%> at him cannot <S%H6965>hold<s%>: the <S%H2595>spear<s%>, the <S%H4551>dart<s%>, nor the coat of <S%H8302>mail<s%>.
He <S%H2803>esteems<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> as <S%H8401>straw<s%>, and <S%H5154>brass<s%> as <S%H7539>rotten<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>.
The <S%H1121>arrow<s%> cannot make him <S%H1272>flee<s%>: <S%H68>slingstones<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> with him into <S%H7179>stubble<s%>.
<S%H8455>Darts<s%> are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble<s%>: he <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at the <S%H7494>shaking<s%> of a <S%H3591>spear<s%>.
<S%H2303>Sharp<s%> <S%H2789>stones<s%> are under <S%H7502>him<s%>: he spreads sharp pointed <S%H2742>things<s%> upon the <S%H2916>mire<s%>.
He makes the <S%H4688>deep<s%> to <S%H7570>boil<s%> like a <S%H5518>pot<s%>: he <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> like a pot of <S%H4841>ointment<s%>.
He makes a <S%H5410>path<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2803>him<s%>; one would think the <S%H8415>deep<s%> to be <S%H7872>hoary<s%>.
Upon <S%H6083>earth<s%> there is not his <S%H4915>like<s%>, who is <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2844>fear<s%>.
He <S%H7200>beholds<s%> all <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H4428>things<s%>: he is a king over all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7830>pride<s%>.
